name: Shiitake Mushroom, Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto, and Shrimp Pasta
author: Jennifer Abel Bandow
summary: Sauteed shiitake mushrooms, sun-dried tomato pesto, and shrimp combined with all the best ingredients to make a succulent pasta that will stay at the front of your recipe box.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese, plus more for topping
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain
Heat a skillet over medium heat; add butter and olive oil
Cook and stir garlic in the hot butter-oil until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add mushrooms and onion; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes
Mix shrimp, diced tomatoes, pesto, wine, and lemon juice into mushroom-onion mixture; simmer for 10 minutes
Remove skillet from heat; add half-and-half, Parmesan cheese, parsley, red pepper flakes, black pepper, and salt and mix until sauce is well combined
Place pasta in a serving bowl
Spoon sauce over pasta and top with extra Parmesan cheese
